title: League of Legends not launching
body: Hey guys and girls, I have a slight problem with my game. When ever I click launch on the home page nothing will happen, as in I click it and then just nothing. Can anyone help me out or have had similar issues?

replies.body: try open task manager and close razer stats then try again. that's what i have to do

> launch on the home page

What is this "home page" you speak of?

Common problem. First thing you should try is launching it in Admin mode (either rightclick and select run as administrator, or go to the c:/riot games folder and select the admin launcher.

If that doesn't work, go to your c/riot games/league of legends folder. Inside the folder called RADS, there will be another folder called "Lol_air_client"
Delete it, and relaunch the admin client. It will patch and redownload the file, usually fixing your problem.
